column14: Philips GC2820 - Steam Iron Buy Online

column17:
Philips presents Steam Iron to make your ironing experience smooth & easy. It has super fast water filling and emptying pointed tip and steam gliding soleplate to speed up ironing. It easily removes creases. It creates steam boost to remove stubborn creases easily & continues steaming upto 30gms/min for better crease removal. It is easy gliding on all fabrics and a longer life. Its drip-stop system keeps your garments spotless while ironing.

  • Continuous steam output: Yes
  • Continuous steam output: 30gms/min
  • Steam boost: 90gms
  • Soleplate type: Steam Glide
  • Vertical steam: Yes
  • Spray: Yes
  • Power: 2000 watts
  • Water tank capacity: 180 ml
  • Power cord length: 2m
  • Cord freedom (swivel): 180 degree cord freedom
